ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: The Last will be better for you than the First.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: What is to come is better for you than what has gone before;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Indeed what is to come will be better for you than what has gone by.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: The reward in the next life will certainly be better for you than worldly gains.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And indeed the latter is better for you than the former.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And indeed the Hereafter is better for you than the present.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And surely what comes after is better for you than that which has gone before.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and the Last shall be better for thee than the First.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And verily the latter portion will be better for thee than the former,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and the Hereafter will indeed be better for you than the present life;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And the Hereafter is indeed better Unto thee than the life present.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and the Hereafter shall be better for you than the world.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And verily the Hereafter will be better for thee than the present.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And indeed the Hereafter is better for you than the present (life of this world).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: The Last shall be better for you than the First.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: The Hereafter is better for you than the First.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And the Hereafter is better for you than the first [life].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [93:4] And verily the Hereafter shall be better for you, by virtue of the honours awaiting you thereat, than the first [life], this world.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And verily the latter portion will be better for thee than the former) He says: the reward of the Hereafter is better for you than the reward of the life of the world.
